items.title: Tax-related selling could set up these 11 stocks for big gains early in 2026
items.description: Insider share ownership and corporate profitability are key to finding stocks that have been temporarily sold off.

items.title: Warren Buffett gifts us 5 secrets for investing success, as he hands off Berkshire’s reins this week
items.description: Three paragraphs in a 1994 letter to Berkshire Hathaway shareholders reveal the top reason for Buffett’s phenomenal winning record.

items.title: These undervalued stocks blew away the S&P 500 in 2025 — a 2026 repeat is likely
items.description: Valuation indicators now are extremely bearish for U.S. stocks. Non-U.S. stocks are a much better bet.

items.title: Silver, gold and copper are trouncing stocks. Here’s what a key chart level suggests could be ahead for 2026.
items.description: Gold and silver are on pace for their biggest yearly percentage gains since 1979.

items.title: ‘I experienced a catastrophic financial loss’: How options trader ‘Captain Condor’ led his followers to a $50 million wipeout
items.description: Captain Condor’s rise coincided with a boom in retail investors trading risky “0DTE” options.
